title: Sign on E and delta G for large K - Cu and Ag+

content.question: If the equilibrium constant for the reaction above is 3.7 x 1015, which of the following correctly describes the standard voltage, E˚, and the standard free energy change, ∆G˚, for this reaction?

choices.label: E˚ is positive and ∆G˚ is negative.
E˚ is negative and ∆G˚ is positive.

content.answer: E˚ is positive and ∆G˚ is negative.

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
